summary:
Open-minded developer. I like to solve interesting and unusual business problems, I try to write supported and extensible code, according to design patterns.

Along with the stack described in the experience section, I have some experience in AngularJS, VueJS, React Native, Flutter, FastAPI (python) (pet projects). Would like to work with SolidJS, SvelteJS, RemixJS. The most interesting challenge for me is to create architecture and develop well-scaled applications.
